title: Roman Catholic Diocese of Araçuaí
text:
The Roman Catholic Diocese of Araçuaí () is a <a href="diocese">diocese</a> located in the city of <a href="Ara%C3%A7ua%C3%AD">Araçuaí</a> in the <a href="Ecclesiastical%20province">Ecclesiastical province</a> of <a href="Roman%20Catholic%20Archdiocese%20of%20Diamantina">Diamantina</a> in Brazil.
According to biographical information contained in the <a href="Vatican%20Press%20Office">Vatican Press Office</a>'s <a href="News.va">News.va</a> and <a href="Vatican%20Information%20Service">Vatican Information Service</a>'s (VIS) daily bulletins (in the section regarding episcopal appointments) for Wednesday, June 13, 2012, <a href="Pope%20Benedict%20XVI">Pope Benedict XVI</a> appointed the Reverend Father Marcello Romano, a member of the clergy of, and at the time the Diocesan Administrator of, the <a href="Roman%20Catholic%20Diocese%20of%20Guanhaes">Roman Catholic Diocese of Guanhaes</a>, as the ninth Bishop of Araçuaí. For more information on the then Bishop-elect of this Diocese, please see the two news releases.
